channel.title: HELP! somethings wrong my server wont run for more then 3 hours!
channel.description:
hey guys, when im running my server like
run.bat it gives me this black box now everytime i turn it on it can be from 20minutes to 3 hours and then it turns offline i didnt even close the black box, when i look at the command box it says
Click here to continue...
how do i make it where the run.bat runs for 24 hours?
@echo off title EvoScape java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: HELP! somethings wrong my server wont run for more then 3 hours!
item.dc:creator: @Thetwistedsnake Thetwistedsnake
item.description:
@Thetwistedsnake wrote:

if its delta try:

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title thetwistedsnakes RunServer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls
if its pi im not sure my code will work.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! somethings wrong my server wont run for more then 3 hours!
